title: John Deere CF16  The Most Advanced Harvesting Machine!  | Ultimate Farming Technology

tasks.task: Operating a John Deere combine harvester
subtasks: Sitting in the cab of the John Deere X9 1100 combine
Navigating the combine through the cornfield
Using the 16-row 30-inch John Deere C16F corn head
Appreciating content from Big Tractor Power YouTube
Inviting viewers to subscribe to the channel
Requesting feedback from corn growers about their equipment
Promoting additional harvesting content on the end screen
Responding to viewers' appreciation in comments
